constituent: kidnap, finger, fingers, mouth, sword, dagger
koohiiStory1: Wrap your FINGERS around someone´s MOUTH to keep them quiet, then put the KNIFE to their throat to ensure their cooperation. This is the best way to KIDNAP someone.
koohiiStory2: After you beckon (#650) someone by seducing them, you kidnap them and hang them upside down (the reversed positions of seduce).
myStory: bắt cóc. tay bịt miệng và cầm dao. khác với tay vẫy sung sướng
words: to carry off, to run away with, to kidnap, to abduct
